Hi,

I'm Dani Vijay.

@UtmostDev

Your friendly neighborhood Full Stack Web Developer (yes, I deals with web). There is a high chance of finding me working with MERN stack at this moment.

I've extensive work experience with ReactJS ( among top 10% in StackOverflow ), NodeJS/ExpressJS, Ruby on Rails, MongoDB and MySQL.

I'm fascinated about new technologies, and love to add them to my arsenal for timely disposal. More than happy to learn stuff to improve projects that I'm working on. I also have some experience because of this habit, with{" "}

In free time, I'll be fiddling with my side projects in . Or you may find me either in {" "} or . Occasional writing experiments can be found in {" "} and . {" "} profile can shed some light to my professional life.
